name: nO retreat "Devil"
description:
Student project 10 - Theme: Sequal

Click to lauch in FULL SCREEN for HD visual experience. Good luck!

Kino-Kat  https://kino-kat.itch.io/

Dio  https://wakabaga.itch.io/

Inputs：

Single W(smaller wave) or QW (larger wave) to move LEFT  (QW must press together for larger wave)

Single O (smaller wave) or OP (larger wave) to move RIGHT  (OP must press together for larger wave)

J to JUMP

SPACE  to BRAKE 

E&I  to FLY  (EI must press together for FLY)

Mouse Click on Ball to Select level

ESC to Quit current level
